text: Ia fo, ian gumazir ekiar ian gariba ian gan suam, ia ingangarim deravɨram a gamizɨ me ia gifonge. Egh ia kamaghɨn nɨghnɨghan markɨ, me ian garir dughiabara, ia ingangarir aghuim damuam. Puvatɨ. Ia Kraisɨn ingangarir gumazir kɨnibara, kamaghɨn ia God ifongezɨ moghɨn ia uan nɨghnɨziba bar da isɨ ingangarim danɨngɨva a damu.
